title: 这是王老师，这是我爸爸。
description:
zhè shì wáng lǎoshī zhè shì wǒ bàba
This is teacher Wang, this is my father.

title: 王老师，您好！
description:
wáng lǎoshī nín hǎo
Teacher Wang, hello!

title: 您好！请进！请坐！请喝茶！
description:
nín hǎo qǐng jìn qǐng zuò qǐng hē chá
Hello! Please come in! Have a seat! Have some tea!

title: 谢谢！
description:
xièxie
Thank you!

title: 不客气！
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome!

title: 工作忙吗？
description:
gōngzuò máng ma
Is your work busy?

title: 不太忙。
description:
bú tài máng
Not too busy.

title: 身体好吗？
description:
shēntǐ hǎo ma
How is your health?

title: 很好！
description:
hěn hǎo
Very good!

title: 请问，你贵姓？
description:
qǐngwèn nǐ guìxìng
Excuse me! What’s your surname?

title: 我姓张。
description:
wǒ xìng zhāng
My surname is Zhang.

title: 你叫什么名字？
description:
nǐ jiào shénme míngzi
What is your full name?

title: 我叫张东。
description:
wǒ jiào zhāng dōng
My full name is Zhang Dong.

title: 你是哪国人？
description:
nǐ shì nǎ guó rén
What nationality are you?

title: 我是中国人，你是哪国人？
description:
wǒ shì zhōngguó rén nǐ shì nǎ guó rén
I’m Chinese, what nationality are you?

title: 我是美国人。
description:
wǒ shì měiguó rén
I'm American.

title: 你学习什么？
description:
nǐ xuéxí shénme
What do you study?

title: 我学习汉语。
description:
wǒ xuěxí hànyǔ
I study Chinese.

title: 汉语难吗？
description:
hànyǔ nán ma
Is Chinese difficult?

title: 汉字很难，发音不太难。
description:
hànzi hěn nán fāyīn bú tài nán
Chinese characters are very difficult, but pronunciation is not too difficult.

title: 这是什么？
description:
zhè shì shénme
What is this?

title: 这是书。
description:
zhè shì shū
This is a book.

title: 这是什么书？
description:
zhè shì shénme shū
What kind of book is this?

title: 这是中文书。
description:
zhè shì zhōngwén shū
This is a Chinese book.

title: 这是谁的书？
description:
zhè shì shéi de shū
Whose book is this?

title: 这是老师的书。
description:
zhè shì lǎoshī de shū
This is the teacher's book.

title: 那是什么？
description:
nà shì shénme
What is that?

title: 那是杂志。
description:
nà shì zázhì
That is a magazine.

title: 那是什么杂志？
description:
nà shì shénme zázhì
What kind of magazine is that?

title: 那是英文杂志。
description:
nà shì yīngwén zázhì
That is an English magazine.

title: 那是谁的杂志？
description:
nà shì shéi de zázhì
Whose magazine is that?

title: 那是我朋友的杂志。
description:
nà shì wǒ péngyou de zázhì
That's my friend's magazine.

title: 你好！
description:
nǐ hǎo
Hello!

title: 你好！
description:
nǐ hǎo
Hello!

title: 你忙吗？
description:
nǐ máng ma
Are you busy?

title: 很忙。
description:
hěn máng
Very busy.

title: 汉语难吗？
description:
hànyǔ nán ma
Is Chinese difficult?

title: 不太难。
description:
bú tài nán
Not too difficult.

title: 你学英语吗？
description:
nǐ xué yīngyǔ ma
Do you study English?

title: 不，学汉语。
description:
bù xué hànyǔ
No, I study Chinese.

title: 去北京吗？
description:
qù běijīng ma
Are you going to Beijing?

title: 对。
description:
duì
Yes.

title: 你去邮局寄信吗？
description:
nǐ qù yóujú jì xìn ma
Are you going to the post office to send a letter?

title: 不去。
description:
bú qù
No

title: 去银行取钱。
description:
qù yínháng qǔ qián
I'm going to the bank to withdraw money.

title: 明天见！
description:
míngtiān jiàn
See you tomorrow!

title: 明天见！
description:
míngtiān jiàn
See you tomorrow!

title: 今天星期几？
description:
jīntiān xīngqī jǐ
What day is it today?

title: 今天星期二。
description:
jīntiān xīngqī èr
Today is Tuesday.

title: 你去哪儿？
description:
nǐ qù nǎr
Where are you going?

title: 我去天安门。
description:
wǒ qù tiān ānmén
I'm going to Tiananmen Square.

title: 你去不去？
description:
nǐ qù bu qù
Are you going too?

title: 不去，我回学校。
description:
bú qù wǒ huí xuéxiào
No, I'm not going, I'm going back to school.

title: 再见！
description:
zàijiàn
Goodbye!

title: 再见！
description:
zàijiàn
Goodbye!

title: 对不起！
description:
duìbuqǐ
I'm sorry!

title: 没关系！
description:
méi guānxi
It's okay!

title: 中午你去哪儿吃饭？
description:
zhōngwǔ nǐ qù nǎr chī fàn
Where are you going for lunch?

title: 我去食堂。
description:
wǒ qù shítáng
I'm going to the cafeteria.

title: 你吃什么？
description:
nǐ chī shénme
What would you like to eat?

title: 我吃馒头。
description:
wǒ chī mántou
I'd like to eat steamed buns.

title: 你要几个？
description:
nǐ yào jǐ ge
How many do you want?

title: 一个。你吃吗？
description:
yí ge nǐ chī ma
One. Would you like to eat?

title: 不吃，我吃米饭。
description:
bù chī wǒ chī mǐfàn
No. I'd like to eat rice.

title: 你喝什么？
description:
nǐ hē shénme
What would you like to drink?

title: 我要一碗鸡蛋汤。
description:
wǒ yào yì wǎn jīdàn tāng
I'd like a bowl of egg soup.

title: 你喝吗？
description:
nǐ hē ma
Would you like to drink?

title: 不喝，我喝啤酒。
description:
bù hē wǒ hē píjiǔ
No, I'd like to drink beer.

title: 这些是什么？
description:
zhèxiē shì shénme
What are these?

title: 这是饺子
description:
zhè shì jiǎozi
These are dumplings.

title: 这是包子
description:
zhè shì bāozi
These are steamed buns.

title: 那是面条。
description:
nà shì miàntiáo
Those are noodles.

title: 你买什么？
description:
nǐ mǎi shénme
What do you buy?

title: 我买水果。
description:
wǒ mǎi shuǐguǒ
I want to buy some fruits.

title: 苹果一斤多少钱？
description:
píngguǒ yì jīn duōshao qián
How much does half a kilogram of apples cost?

title: 三块。
description:
sān kuài
Three yuan.

title: 三块？
description:
sān kuài
Three yuan?

title: 太贵了。
description:
tài guì le
That's too expensive.

title: 两块五吧。
description:
liǎng kuài wǔ ba
How about 2 yuan and 5 mao?

title: 你要几斤？
description:
nǐ yào jǐ jīn
How many kilograms do you want?

title: 我买五斤。
description:
wǒ mǎi wǔ jīn
I'll take 2.5 kilograms.

title: 还要别的吗？
description:
hái yào biéde ma
Do you need anything else?

title: 橘子怎么卖？
description:
júzi zěnme mài
How much are the oranges?

title: 两块。
description:
liǎng kuài
Two yuan.

title: 要两斤。
description:
yào liǎng jīn
I'll take one kilogram.

title: 一共多少钱？
description:
yígòng duōshao qián
How much is it in total?

title: 一共十六块五。
description:
yígòng shíliù kuài wǔ
It's a total of 16 yuan 5 mao.

title: 你给十六块吧。
description:
nǐ gěi shíliù kuài ba
But you give me 16 yuan.

title: 给你钱。
description:
gěi nǐ qián
Here's your money.

title: 这是五十，找¹您三十四块。
description:
zhè shì wǔshí zhǎo nín sānshísì kuài
This is 50 yuan, here's your change of 34 yuan.

title: 下午我去图书馆，你去不去？
description:
xiàwǔ wǒ qù túshūguǎn nǐ qù bú qù
In the afternoon, I'm going to the library, are you going too?

title: 我不去。我要去银行换钱。
description:
wǒ bú qù wǒ yào qù yínháng huàn qián
I'm not going. I need to go to the bank to exchange some money.

title: 小姐，我换钱。
description:
xiǎojie wǒ huàn qián
Miss, I'd like to exchange money.

title: 您换什么钱？
description:
nín huàn shénme qián
What currency would you like to exchange?

title: 我换人民币。
description:
wǒ huàn rénmínbì
I'd like to exchange Chinese yuan.

title: 换多少？
description:
huàn duōshao
How much?

title: 二百美元。
description:
èr bǎi měiyuán
200 dollars.

title: 请等一会儿......
description:
qǐng děng yihuìr
Please wait a moment...

title: 先生，给您钱。
description:
xiānsheng gěi nín qián
Sir, here is your money.

title: 请数数。
description:
qǐng shǔshu
Please count it.

title: 对了。谢谢！
description:
duì le xièxie
It's correct. Thank you!

title: 不客气！
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome.

title: 请问，这是办公室吗？
description:
qǐng wèn zhè shì bàngōngshì ma
Excuse me, is this the office?

title: 是。你找²谁？
description:
shì nǐ zhǎo shéi
Yes. Who are you looking for?

title: 王老师在吗？
description:
wáng lǎoshī zài ma
Is teacher Wang here?

title: 我是他的学生。
description:
wǒ shì tā de xuésheng
I'm his student.

title: 他不在。他在家呢。
description:
tā búzài tā zàijiā ne
He is not here. He is at home.

title: 他住哪儿？
description:
tā zhù nǎr
Where does he live?

title: 他住十八楼一门，房间号是601。
description:
tā zhù shíbā lóu yī mén fángjiān hào shì liù líng yāo
He lives in Flat 18, door 1, room number is 601.

title: 您知道他的电话号码吗？
description:
nín zhīdào tā de diànhuà hàomǎ ma
Do you know his phone number?

title: 知道，62931074。
description:
zhīdào liù èr jiǔ sān yāo líng qī sì
Yes, I do. 62931074.

title: 他的手机号码是多少？
description:
tā de shǒujī hàomǎ shì duōshao
How about his mobile number?

title: 不知道。
description:
bù zhīdào
I don't know.

title: 谢谢您！
description:
xièxie nín
Thank you!

title: 不客气。
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome.

title: 我先介绍一下儿。
description:
wǒ xiān jièshào yíxiàr
First let me introduce you.

title: 这位是王教授。
description:
zhè wèi shì wáng jiàoshòu
This is Professor Wang.

title: 这是马校长。
description:
zhè shì mǎ xiàozhǎng
This is Principal Ma.

title: 欢迎您，王教授。
description:
huānyíng nín wáng jiàoshòu
Welcome, Professor Wang.

title: 谢谢！
description:
xièxie
Thank you!

title: 你是留学生吗？
description:
nǐ shì liúxuéshēng ma
Are you an international student?

title: 是。
description:
shì
Yes.

title: 罗兰也是留学生吗？
description:
Luólán yě shì liúxuéshēng ma
Is Roland also an international student?

title: 她也是留学生。
description:
tā yě shì liúxuéshēng
She is also an international student.

title: 我们都是留学生。
description:
wǒmen dōu shì liúxuéshēng
We are both international students.

title: 张东和田芳也都是留学生吗？
description:
Zhāngdōng hé Tiánfāng yě dōu shì liúxuéshēng ma
Are Zhang Dong and Tian Fang also international students?

title: 不，他们俩不是留学生。
description:
bù tāmen liǎ bú shì liúxuéshēng
No, the two of them are not international students.

title: 他们都是中国学生。
description:
tāmen dōu shì zhōngguó xuésheng
They are both Chinese students.

title: 他是中国人吗？
description:
tā shì zhōngguó rén ma
Is he Chinese?

title: 是。
description:
shì
Yes.

title: 你也是中国人吗？
description:
nǐ yě shì zhōngguó rén ma
Are you Chinese too?

title: 不是。我是韩国人。
description:
bú shì wǒ shì hánguó rén
No, I am Korean.

title: 对不起。
description:
duì bu qǐ
Sorry.

title: 没什么。
description:
méi shénme
It's okay.

title: 你在哪儿学习汉语？
description:
nǐ zài nǎr xuéxí hànyǔ
Where do you study Chinese?

title: 在北京语言大学。
description:
zài běijīng yǔyán dàxué
I study Chinese at Beijing Language and Culture University.

title: 你们的老师怎么样？
description:
nǐmen de lǎoshī zěnmeyàng
How is your teacher?

title: 很好。
description:
hěn hǎo
Very good.

title: 你觉得学习汉语难吗？
description:
nǐ juéde xuéxí hànyǔ nán ma
Do you think studying Chinese is difficult?

title: 我觉得语法不太难。
description:
wǒ juéde yǔfǎ bú tài nán
I think the grammar is not too difficult.

title: 听和说也比较容易，但是读和写很难。
description:
tīng hé shuō yě bǐjiào róngyì dànshì dú hé xiě hěn nán
Listening and Speaking are relatively easy, but Reading and Writing are very difficult.

title: 我给²你们介绍一下儿
description:
wǒ gěi nǐmen jièshào yíxiàr
Let me introduce you guys

title: 这位是新同学，是我的同屋。
description:
zhè wèi shì xīn tóngxué shì wǒ de tóngwū
This person is the new classmate, he is my roommate.

title: 你在哪个班学习？
description:
nǐ zài nǎ ge bān xuéxí
Which class are you in?

title: 在103班。
description:
zài yāo líng sān bān
I'm in class 103.

title: 你们的老师是谁？
description:
nǐmen de lǎoshī shì shéi
Who is your teacher?

title: 我们的老师是林老师。
description:
wǒmen de lǎoshī shì lín lǎoshī
Our teacher is Teacher Lin.

title: 你没有箱子吗？
description:
nǐ méiyǒu xiāngzi ma
Don't you have a suitcase?

title: 有啊。我的在这儿呢。
description:
yǒu a wǒ de zài zhèr ne
Yes, I do. Mine are right here.

title: 我的很重，你的重不重？
description:
wǒ de hěn zhòng nǐ de zhòng bu zhòng
Mine is very heavy. Are yours heavy?

title: 这个黑的很重，那个红的比较轻。
description:
zhè ge hēi de hěn zhòng nà ge hóng de bǐjiào qīng
This black one is very heavy, that red one is lighter.

title: 你的箱子很新，我的很旧。
description:
nǐ de xiāngzi hěn xīn wǒ de hěn jiù
Your suitcase is very new, mine is very old.

title: 那个新的是朋友的。
description:
nà ge xīn de shì péngyou de
The new one is my friend's.

title: 这个旧的是我的。
description:
zhè ge jiù de shì wǒ de
The old one is mine.

title: 先生，这些黑的是什么东西？
description:
xiānsheng zhèxie hēi de shì shénme dōngxi
Sir, what are these black things?

title: 这是一些药。
description:
zhè shì yìxiē yào
These are some medicines.

title: 什么药？
description:
shénme yào
What kind of medicines?

title: 中药。
description:
zhōngyào
Chinese medicine.

title: 这是不是药？
description:
zhè shì bú shì yào
Is this medicine too?

title: 这不是药，这是茶叶。
description:
zhè bú shì yào zhè shì cháyè
This isn't medicine, it's tea leaves.

title: 那个箱子里是什么？
description:
nà ge xiāngzi li shì shénme
What's in that suitcase?

title: 都是日用品。
description:
dōu shì rìyòngpǐn
It's all daily necessities.

title: 有两件衣服、一把雨伞和一瓶香水，
description:
yǒu liǎng jiàn yīfu yì bǎ yǔsǎn hé yì píng xiāngshuǐ
Two pieces of clothing, an umbrella and a bottle of perfume.

title: 还有一本书、一本词典、两张光盘和三支笔。
description:
hái yǒu yì běn shū yì běn cídiǎn liǎng zhāng guāngpán hé sān zhī bǐ
also a book, a dictionary, two CDs and three pens.

title: 王老师，好久不见了。
description:
wáng lǎoshī hǎojiǔ bú jiàn le
Teacher Wang, long time no see.

title: 啊！关经理，欢迎，欢迎！
description:
à guān jīnglǐ huānyíng huānyíng
Ah, Manager Guan! Welcome! Welcome!

title: 您身体好吗？
description:
nín shēntǐ hǎo ma
How is your health?

title: 很好。您身体怎么样？
description:
hěn hǎo nín shēntǐ zěnmeyàng
Very good! How about your health?

title: 马马虎虎。
description:
mǎmahūhū
So-so.

title: 最近工作忙不忙？
description:
zuìjìn gōngzuò máng bu máng
Has your work been busy lately?

title: 不太忙，您呢？
description:
bú tài máng nín ne
Not too busy, and you?

title: 刚开学，有点儿忙。
description:
gāng kāi xué yóudiǎnr máng
New term just started, so I'm a bit busy.

title: 喝点儿什么？茶还是咖啡？
description:
hē diǎnr shénme chá háishi kāfēi
What would you like to drink? Tea or coffee?

title: 喝杯茶吧！
description:
hē bēi chá ba
Let's have a cup of tea!

title: 我的车呢？
description:
wǒ de chē ne
Where is my bike?

title: 你的车是什么颜色的？
description:
nǐ de chē shì shénme yánsè de
Which color is your bike?

title: 蓝的。
description:
lán de
The blue one!

title: 是新的还是旧的？
description:
shì xīn de háishi jiù de
Is it the new one or the old one?

title: 新的。
description:
xīn de
The new one.

title: 那辆蓝的是不是你的？
description:
nà liàng lán de shì bu shì nǐ de
Is that blue one yours?

title: 哪辆？
description:
nǎ liàng
Which one?

title: 那辆！
description:
nà liàng
That one!

title: 不是。......啊，我的车在那儿呢。
description:
bú shì à wǒ de chē zài nàr ne
No, it's not. ... Ah! My bike is there.

title: 你家有几口人？
description:
nǐ jiā yǒu jǐ kǒu rén
How many people are in your family?

title: 我家有五口人，爸爸、妈妈、哥哥、姐姐和我。
description:
wǒ jiā yǒu wǔ kǒu rén bàba māma gēge jiějie hé wǒ
There are five people in my family, my father, my mother, my older brother, my older sister and me.

title: 你有没有全家的照片？
description:
nǐ yǒu méiyǒu quán jiā de zhàopiàn
Do you have a family photo?

title: 有一张。你看，这是我们全家的照片。
description:
yǒu yì zhāng nǐ kàn zhè shì wǒmen quán jiā de zhàopiàn
Yes, I have one. Look, this is a photo of my whole family.

title: 你有哥哥姐姐吗？
description:
nǐ yǒu gēge jiějie ma
Do you have any older brothers or sisters?

title: 我没有哥哥，也没有姐姐，只有两个弟弟。
description:
wǒ méiyǒu gēge yě méiyǒu jiějie zhǐ yǒu liǎng ge dìdi
No, I don't have neither older brothers nor older sisters, I only have two younger brothers.

title: 你爸爸、妈妈做什么工作？
description:
nǐ bàba māma zuò shénme gōngzuò
What do your parents do?

title: 我妈妈是大夫，在医院工作，爸爸是一家公司的经理。
description:
wǒ māma shì dàifu zài yīyuàn gōngzuò bàba shì yì jiā gōngsī de jīnglǐ
My mom is a doctor and works in a hospital, and my dad is a manager at a company.

title: 我妈妈在商店工作，爸爸是律师。
description:
wǒ māma zài shāngdiàn gōngzuò bàba shì lǜshī
My mom works in a shop, and my dad is a lawyer.

title: 你们是一家什么公司？
description:
nǐmen shì yì jiā shénme gōngsī
What kind of company is yours?

title: 是一家外贸公司。
description:
shì yì jiā wàimào gōngsī
It's a foreign trade company.

title: 是一家大公司吗？
description:
shì yì jiā dà gōngsī ma
Is it a big company?

title: 不大，是一家比较小的公司。
description:
bú dà shì yì jiā bǐjiào xiǎo de gōngsī
No, it's a relatively small company.

title: 有多少职员？
description:
yǒu duōshao zhíyuán
How many employees are there?

title: 大概有一百多个职员。
description:
dàgài yǒu yì bǎi duō ge zhíyuán
There are about over 100 employees.

title: 都是中国职员吗？
description:
dōu shì zhōngguó zhíyuán ma
Are they all Chinese employees?

title: 不都是中国职员，也有外国职员。
description:
bù dōu shì zhōngguó zhíyuán yě yǒu wàiguó zhíyuán
Not all of them are Chinese, there are also foreign employees.

title: 我现在去图书馆，你跟我一起去，好吗？
description:
Wǒ xiànzài qù túshūguǎn, nǐ gēn wǒ yìqǐ qù, hǎo ma?
I'm going to the library now. Want to come with me?

title: 好，咱们走吧。
description:
Hǎo, zánmen zǒu ba.
Sure, let’s go.

title: 你常去图书馆吗？
description:
Nǐ cháng qù túshūguǎn ma?
Do you go to the library often?

title: 常去。我常借书，也常在那儿看书。
description:
Cháng qù. Wǒ cháng jiè shū, yě cháng zài nàr kàn shū.
Yes, I go often. I often borrow books and read there, too.

title: 你呢？常去吗？
description:
Nǐ ne? Cháng qù ma?
What about you? Do you go often?

title: 我也常去。
description:
Wǒ yě cháng qù.
I go often too.

title: 有时候借书，有时候上网查资料，但不常在那儿看书。
description:
Yǒu shíhou jiè shū, yǒu shíhou shàng wǎng chá zīliào, dàn bù cháng zài nàr kàn shū.
Sometimes I borrow books, sometimes I go online to do research, but I don’t usually read there.

title: 我总在宿舍看书。
description:
Wǒ zǒng zài sùshè kàn shū.
I usually read in my dorm.

title: 你的宿舍安静吗？
description:
Nǐ de sùshè ānjìng ma?
Is your dorm quiet?

title: 很安静。
description:
Hěn ānjìng.
Very quiet.

title: 晚上你常做什么？
description:
Wǎnshang nǐ cháng zuò shénme?
What do you usually do in the evening?

title: 复习课文，预习生词，或者做练习。
description:
Fùxí kèwén, yùxí shēngcí, huòzhě zuò liànxí.
I review the texts, preview new vocabulary, or do exercises.

title: 有时候上网跟朋友聊天儿或者收发伊妹儿。
description:
Yǒu shíhou shàng wǎng gēn péngyou liáo tiānr huòzhě shōufā yīmèir.
Sometimes I go online to chat with friends, or send and receive emails.

title: 我也是，我还常看中文电影和电视剧的DVD。
description:
Wǒ yě shì, wǒ hái cháng kàn Zhōngwén diànyǐng hé diànshìjù de DVD.
Me too. I also often watch Chinese movies and TV drama DVDs.

title: 你常看吗？
description:
Nǐ cháng kàn ma?
Do you watch them often?

title: 我很少看。
description:
Wǒ hěn shǎo kàn.
I rarely watch them.

title: 星期六和星期日你做什么？
description:
Xīngqīliù hé xīngqīrì nǐ zuò shénme?
What do you usually do on Saturdays and Sundays?

title: 有时候在宿舍休息，有时候跟朋友一起去公园玩儿或者去超市买东西。
description:
Yǒu shíhou zài sùshè xiūxi, yǒu shíhou gēn péngyou yìqí qù gōngyuán wánr huòzhě qù chāoshì mǎi dōngxi.
Sometimes I rest in the dorm, and sometimes I go to the park with friends or go shopping at the supermarket.

title: 麦克在宿舍吗？
description:
Màikè zài sùshè ma?
Is Mike in the dorm?

title: 在。
description:
Zài.
Yes, he is.

title: 他在做什么呢？
description:
Tā zài zuò shénme ne?
What’s he doing?

title: 我出来的时候，他正在听音乐呢。
description:
Wǒ chūlai de shíhou, tā zhèngzài tīng yīnyuè ne.
When I came out, he was listening to music.

title: 你是不是在听音乐呢？
description:
Nǐ shì bu shì zài tīng yīnyuè ne?
Are you listening to music?

title: 没有，我正听课文录音呢。
description:
Méiyǒu, wǒ zhèng tīng kèwén lùyīn ne.
No, I’m listening to the recording of the text.

title: 下午你有事儿吗？
description:
Xiàwǔ nǐ yǒu shìr ma?
Do you have anything to do this afternoon?

title: 没有事儿。
description:
Méiyǒu shìr.
No, I don’t.

title: 我们一起去书店，好吗？
description:
Wǒmen yìqǐ qù shūdiàn, hǎo ma?
Let’s go to the bookstore together, okay?

title: 你要买什么书？
description:
Nì yào mǎi shénme shū?
What book are you going to buy?

title: 我想买一本《汉英词典》。
description:
Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yì běn “Hàn-Yīng Cídiǎn”.
I want to buy a Chinese-English dictionary.

title: 咱们怎么去呢？
description:
Zánmen zěnme qù ne?
How should we get there?

title: 坐车去吧。
description:
Zuò chē qù ba.
Let’s go by bus.

title: 今天星期六，坐车太挤，骑车去怎么样？
description:
Jīntiān xīngqīliù, zuò chē tài jǐ, qí chē qù zěnmeyàng?
Today’s Saturday, buses are too crowded. How about riding a bike?

title: 行。
description:
Xíng.
Okay.

title: 玛丽，你们有几门课？
description:
mǎlì nǐmen yǒu jǐ mén kè
Mary, how many classes do you have?

title: 现在只有四门课：综合课、口语课、听力课和阅读课。
description:
xiànzài zhǐ yǒu sì mén kè zōnghé kè kǒuyǔ kè tīnglì kè hé yuèdú kè
Now we only have four classes: general studies, speaking, listening and reading classes.

title: 有文化课和体育课吗？
description:
yǒu wénhuà kè hé tǐyù kè ma
Do you have culture and PE classes?

title: 没有。
description:
méiyǒu
No, we don't.

title: 林老师教你们什么？
description:
lín lǎoshī jiāo nǐmen shénme
What does Teacher Lin teach you?

title: 她教我们听力和阅读。
description:
tā jiāo wǒmen tīnglì hé yuèdú
She teaches us Listening and Reading.

title: 谁教你们综合课和口语课？
description:
shéi jiāo nǐmen zōnghé kè hé kǒuyǔ kè
Who teaches you guys General Studies and Speaking?

title: 王老师。
description:
wáng lǎoshī
Teacher Wang.

title: 张东，你要去哪儿？
description:
zhāng dōng nǐ yào qù nǎr
Zhang Dong, where are you going?

title: 我去邮局寄包裹，顺便去书店买一本书。
description:
wǒ qù yóujú jì bāoguǒ shùnbiàn qù shūdiān mǎi yì běn shū
I'm going to the post office to send a parcel, and then to the bookstore to buy a book.

title: 你去吗？
description:
nǐ qù ma
Do you want to go?

title: 不去，一会儿玛丽来找我。
description:
bú qù yíhuìr mǎlì lái zhǎo wǒ
No, Mary is coming to see me in a while.

title: 你顺便替我买几张邮票和一份青年报吧。
description:
nǐ shùnbiàn tì wǒ mǎi jǐ zhāng yóupiào hé yí fēn qīngniánbào ba
While you're at it, can you buy me some stamps and a copy of Youth Daily?

title: 好的。
description:
hǎo de
Sure.

title: 我给你拿钱。
description:
wǒ gěi nǐ ná qián
Let me give you some money.

title: 不用，先用我的钱买吧。
description:
búyòng xiān yòng wǒ de qián mǎi ba
No need, just use my money first.

title: 玛丽，我明天去上海。
description:
mǎlì wǒ míngtiān qù shānghǎi
Mary, I'm going to Shanghai tomorrow.

title: 你去上海旅行吗？
description:
nǐ qù shànghǎi lǚxíng ma
Are you going to Shanghai for traveling?

title: 不，明天一个外贸代表团去上海参观
description:
bù míngtiān yí ge wàimào dàibiǎotuán qù shànghǎi cānguān
No, a foreign trade delegation is going to visit Shanghai tomorrow

title: 我去给他们当翻译。
description:
wǒ qù gěi tāmen dāng fānyì
I'm going to be an interpreter for them.

title: 坐飞机去还是坐火车去？
description:
zuò fēijī qù háishi zuò huǒchē qù
Are you going by plane or train?

title: 坐飞机去。
description:
zuò fēijī qù
By plane.

title: 什么时候回来？
description:
shénme shíhou huílai
When will you be back?

title: 八号回来。
description:
bā hào huílai
I'll be back on the 8th.

title: 替我办一件事，行吗？
description:
tì wǒ bàn yi jiàn shì xíng ma
Can you do me a favor?

title: 什么事？你说吧。
description:
shénme shì nǐ shuō ba
What is it? Just tell me.

title: 帮我浇一下儿花。
description:
bāng wǒ jiāo yíxiàr huā
Can you help me water my flowers?

title: 行，没问题。
description:
xíng méi wèntí
Okay, no problem!
